title: How to Get Xbox Live Gold on iPhone or iPad

steps.headline: Go to https://www.xbox.com/en-US/live/gold in a web browser.
steps.description: Using a mobile web browser, such as Safari, go to the Xbox Live Gold page.

steps.headline: Tap Join Today.
steps.description: It's the green button below the large image that says "Gold".

steps.headline: Select a subscription plan in the drop-down box.
steps.description:
Tap the pulldown menu that says "Xbox Live Gold 1 Month" and tap one of the following options:
1 month for $9.99. 3 months for $24.99. 12 months for $59.99.

steps.headline: Tap Join Now.
steps.description: It's the blue button underneath the drop-down menu.

steps.headline: Sign in to your Microsoft account.
steps.description: Enter the email address and password associated with your Microsoft account and

steps.headline: Verify your email address.
steps.description: Tap the box that contains your email address and then enter the matching email in the text box.

steps.headline: Tap Send Code.
steps.description: This will send a verification code to your email address.

steps.headline: Check your email for the verification code.
steps.description: An email containing a verification code should be sent to the email account associated with your Microsoft account. Make note of the verification code.

steps.headline: Enter the code and tap Verify.
steps.description: Back on the Xbox website, type the verification code into the text box and tap "Verify" to submit it. This returns you to the subscription page.

steps.headline: Tap Join now.
steps.description: It's the same blue button you tapped earlier, below the subscription drop-down box. This will display the default payment method of your Microsoft account. If you don't have a payment option saved with your Microsoft account, you'll be asked to provide payment information.

steps.headline: Tap Subscribe.
steps.description: It's the blue button at the bottom of the payment screen. The credit card on your Xbox account will be charged and your subscription to XBox Live Gold will start immediately.

text:
Go to https://www.xbox.com/en-US/live/gold in a web browser. Using a mobile web browser, such as Safari, go to the Xbox Live Gold page. Tap Join Today. It's the green button below the large image that says "Gold". Select a subscription plan in the drop-down box. Tap the pulldown menu that says "Xbox Live Gold 1 Month" and tap one of the following options:
1 month for $9.99. 3 months for $24.99. 12 months for $59.99. Tap Join Now. It's the blue button underneath the drop-down menu. Sign in to your Microsoft account. Enter the email address and password associated with your Microsoft account and Verify your email address. Tap the box that contains your email address and then enter the matching email in the text box. Tap Send Code. This will send a verification code to your email address. Check your email for the verification code. An email containing a verification code should be sent to the email account associated with your Microsoft account. Make note of the verification code. Enter the code and tap Verify. Back on the Xbox website, type the verification code into the text box and tap "Verify" to submit it. This returns you to the subscription page. Tap Join now. It's the same blue button you tapped earlier, below the subscription drop-down box. This will display the default payment method of your Microsoft account. If you don't have a payment option saved with your Microsoft account, you'll be asked to provide payment information. Tap Subscribe. It's the blue button at the bottom of the payment screen. The credit card on your Xbox account will be charged and your subscription to XBox Live Gold will start immediately.
